cnbc.title: Google stock jumps 8% after search giant avoids worst-case penalties in antitrust case
cnbc.summary: The ruling comes nearly a year after a U.S. judge ruled that Google holds an illegal monopoly in its core market of internet search.

cnbc.title: Trump will ask Supreme Court for 'expedited ruling' on tariffs appeal
cnbc.summary: A federal appeals court last week ruled most of President Donald Trump’s global tariffs are illegal, undercutting his expansive trade policy.

cnbc.title: What Trump's tariff loss in court means for shippers and the billions in trade duties collected by U.S. government
cnbc.summary: President Trump's court loss adds another layer of uncertainty to global shipping, from questions about refunds to status of trade deals and the tariff plan B.

cnbc.title: Fed Governor Lisa Cook 'did not ever commit mortgage fraud,' her lawyer says
cnbc.summary: Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook is suing President Donald Trump to block him from firing her, saying that his mortgage fraud allegations are not true.

cnbc.title: Salesforce is having a bad year. This is where investors want to see growth
cnbc.summary: Investors want to see Salesforce's Agentforce artificial intelligence tool for customer service pick up traction.

cnbc.title: Abbe Lowell: The veteran defense lawyer squaring off against Trump in Federal Reserve fight
cnbc.summary: Abbe Lowell, who has defended Hunter Biden, New York Attorney General Letitia James, Jared Kushner and others is again taking on President Donald Trump.

cnbc.title: Waymo starts testing in Denver, Seattle in bid to expand robotaxi service across U.S.
cnbc.summary: Waymo is moving into new markets as it seeks to expand its lead in the nascent U.S. robotaxi industry.

cnbc.title: Treasury yields jump on prospect of U.S. having to refund tariff money; 30-year yield tops 4.97%
cnbc.summary: U.S. Treasury yields were higher on Tuesday as investors looked ahead to a key jobs report on Friday and monitored the latest tariff developments.

cnbc.title: Amazon cracks down on Prime free shipping sharing
cnbc.summary: The company is ending the program in favor of Amazon Family, which lets users share Prime benefits with another adult, but they must share the same address.

cnbc.title: A historic change in how Americans buy groceries is underway as SNAP benefit cuts begin
cnbc.summary: Cuts to SNAP benefits in President Trump's tax law begin on Monday, a historic change in government support for low-income American food shopping.
